To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private ThreeOutside _threeoutside;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_threeoutside = ThreeOutside(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_threeoutside.IsReady)
{
    var current = _threeoutside.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.threeoutside = self.ThreeOutside(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.threeoutside.IsReady:
    current = self.threeoutside.Current.Value
